components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM
summary: 2008 HYOSUNG 250 SCOOTER. CONSUMER STATES PROBLEM WITH STARTING THE SCOOTER *TGW  THE CONSUMER STATED AFTER THE SCOOTER SAT IN THE HEAT FOR SEVERAL HOURS, IT WOULD START UP. AN INJECTOR PULSE AND POWER RELAY WERE INSTALLED AT A COST OF $200.  HOWEVER, THE STARTING PROBLEMS CONTINUED. THE ELECTRIC FUEL PUMP WOULD NOT KICK IN AND A SECOND RELAY WAS INSTALLED.  THE CONSUMER WAS THEN INFORMED AN ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE WAS NEEDED AT A COST OF $ 400.
